Trust us, You’ll Want to Bookmark our Essential Guide to Crowdfunding

Unsure how to launch a crowdfunding campaign? Looking for promotion ideas? Want to hear how other campaign hit their goals? Taking your idea from concept to market is a fun and exciting journey - and at every step, creator like you should have access to guidance, encouragement, and answers to all your questions.
That’s why we’ve launched The Essential Guide to Crowdfunding, created by Indiegogo’s expert team of campaign specialists who’ve guided thousands of campaign to big wins.
The Essensial Guide is designed to educate and navigate you through the launch of succeful crowdfunding campaign. Each chapter will take you through a different part of the process - from planning and preparing to creating anf running your very own campaign.
Here’s just some of what you’ll find in the guide : Benefits of crowdfunding, from market vailidation to awareness-building How to develop your communities, including social media networks and mailing lists Designing the perfect campaign page on Indiegogo, with real-life examples to inspire you The difference between a hard and soft launch, and why timing is everything How to maintain momentum during your campaign, from contests to perk strategy
The guide is meant to help crowdfunders of every level learn the ins and outs of running a successful campaign. So, dont’s wait. Head on over the Essensial Guide to Crowdfunding.
